document_data.name: Weavemoss
document_data.mainbody: '''Weavemoss''' was a species of lichen, sometimes referred to as the '''Wizard's Beard'''.
document_data.Description: Weavemoss were small but distinctly long, in appearance, light purple lichen. This species of moss was known to grow in the areas ripe with the ''[[weave]]'' magic.
document_data.Availability: Weavemoss was known to grow in the underground locations in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Usages: Weavemoss cold be used to create a vitriol for [[alchemical]] purposes. The said vitriol of weavemoss was used to brew ''[[elixirs of arcane cultivation]]''.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], a handful of Wizard's Beard was valued at fifteen [[gold]] [[coin]]s.
